{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04470v1", "title": "Halin graphs with positive Lin-Lu-Yau curvature", "summary": "Halin graphs constitute an interesting class of planar and polyhedral graphs.
A generalized Halin graph is obtained by connecting all leaves of a planar
embedding of a tree via a cycle. A Halin graph is a generalized Halin graph
having no vertex of degree two. We classify all generalized Halin graphs with
positive Lin-Lu-Yau curvature.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO,math.DG", "published": "2025-05-07T14:39:13Z"}
